section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:emth::Arithmetic
Class with some functions for arithmetic math EParserTest
Class that provides a test fixture for the test cases emthp::Lexer
Class that works as a token supplier for the Parser class emth::Monomial
Class for representing and operating monomials emthp::Parser
Class that wraps a std::string and parses it as a Monomial or as a Polynomial emth::Polynomial
Class for representing and operating polynomials emthp::Token
Struct for representing a token as a type and a value
